Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.strategies

Interface Summary
DecayStrategy A strategy pattern for decaying Activatibles or Learnables Implementations should add themselves to LidaElementFactory via the factoriesData.xml configuration file.
ExciteStrategy A strategy pattern for exciting Activatibles or Learnables Implementations should add themselves to LidaElementFactory via the factoriesData.xml configuration file.
Strategy Generic designation for all types of strategies such as decay, excite, etc.
TotalActivationStrategy A strategy that calculates total activation.
 

Class Summary
ApproxSigmoidDecayStrategy Approx implementation of sigmoid decay.
ApproxSigmoidExciteStrategy Approx implementation of sigmoid excite.
DefaultExciteStrategy WARNING: Renaming this class requires renaming values in configs/factoriesData.xml
DefaultExciteStrategyTest  
DefaultTotalActivationStrategy Default method to calculate total activation.
LinearDecayStrategy WARNING: Renaming this class requires renaming values in configs/factoriesData.xml
LinearDecayStrategyTest  
SigmoidDecayStrategy Default implementation of sigmoid decay.
SigmoidExciteStrategy Default implementation of sigmoid excite.
StrategyImpl
